channel.title: Water is almost invisible
channel.description:
Hi there,
In my Black Mesa game, all the regular water is almost completely transparent (looking at it from the outside). The water sounds and swimming animation is there. Strangely I can see the radioactive fluids just fine.
[b]Screenshots:[/b]
1. [url]https://pbrd.co/1tqgH79[/url] 1. [url]https://pbrd.co/1tqjtJu[/url] 1. [url]https://pbrd.co/1tqjygo[/url] 1. [url]https://pbrd.co/1tqjDRh[/url] (when I am swimming, all looks OK from below the surface) 1. [url]https://pbrd.co/1tqjMEj[/url] 1. [url]https://pbrd.co/1tqjSvo[/url]
Remarks: 1) The screenshots taken are from the dam in Surface Tension, but the issue affects all water throughout the game! Just to clarify... :wink: ) 2) The issue is not related to the available command to make water gone! I tried that one already without any effect: [i]mat_drawwater 1[/i]
I am a bit confused, as I didn't have this issue with the first version of BMS, but since updating to the most recent version. Additionally I installed the [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=15754']"On the rails uncut" extension[/url] so as the [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=14627']"Xen" maps[/url]. Might I have messed something up by installing those?
[b]Does anybody have a clue how I might investigate the root cause of this issue or even how to fix it (probably a missing/wrong file or something)?[/b]
Thanks for any help and ideas :slight_smile:
